title: MD
biography: Arvinder Singh Soin is an Indian surgeon and the Chief Hepatobiliary and Liver Transplant Surgeon & Chairman of the Institute of Liver Transplantation and Regenerative Medicine, Medanta-The Medicity. Known for his work in the field of liver transplantation, Soin also runs the Liver Transplant institute at the Sir H. N. Reliance Foundation Hospital, Mumbai. He has performed more than 3500 living donor liver transplants in India.
aiSummary: Arvinder Singh is a retina surgery specialist with an H-index of 110 at Ophthalmology (Faculty). Has been published in The Lancet, The Lancet Diabetes & Endocrinology, The Lancet Child & Adolescent Health. Based in India.
